name: youdiedbanry.zip
items: You Died But a Necromancer Revived You.sh

attr.title: You Died But a Necromancer Revived You
attr.desc:
You Died ... but a Necromancer revived you! And will keep bringing you back to their crazy tower of death until you reach the top floor and get rid of them, allowing you to finally be free...
Can you stop this madness?
Or will you give up?
Reaching the top is no easy feat!
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from Itch.io or Steam.

Steam:
Run Steam console via Windows+R: Type: steam://open/console, download the linux version by typing: download_depot 1037100 1037102 in the console, when the download is complete, it will tell you the location of the folder, copy the game.unx from the assets folder to /ports/youdiedbanry/gamedata.

Itch:
Download YouDied_BaNRY.zip and copy the game.unx from the assets folder to /ports/youdiedbanry/gamedata.
